education.systems-engineer-description: After obtaining my first job with the knowledge I acquired at SENA, I paid for my university, I worked during the day and studied at night, with a lot of effort and sacrifice I was able to finish my studies and graduate as a Systems Engineer.
education.adsi: Technologist in Analysis and Development of Information Systems
education.adsi-description: Without having many resources and with a computer that barely survived, I started studying at SENA, performing with great academic performance.
education.adsi-description-2: Together with two other colleagues, we represented the Quind√≠o region in the national SenaSoft competitions (2017) in the web development competition.
education.technical-bachelor-description: In high school, I enrolled in the Systems modality since I was always attracted to technology, it is here where I became passionate about development, I enjoyed seeing the software classes with Scratch and flowcharts every week, begging to start programming, but today I am grateful for the good teachers I had and the good foundations they planted in me, helping me develop critical reasoning and problem-solving.
